levels.description: Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>Increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attacks hit <@ba.vup>2</> enemies at once; <$ba.charged>Charged</>: Attacks hit <@ba.vup>3</> enemies at once, duration increased to <@ba.vup>{enhanced_duration}</>s. If target is under the effect of <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn damage</> burst, additionally deal <@ba.vup>{attack@ep_damage_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Elemental Damage
